subject: Re: Copying files from a Vista machine fails
body:
Quoting Frank Meerkoetter :

> The machine running the smbclient is a small arm based system.
> I am using samba-3.0.25.

Just a short follow up. It does not happen when running the same
code on an x86 machine. Another difference between both machines
is that the arm system is running the uclibc instead of the glibc.

Cheers,
    Frank
